item.title: Java - Avoid multiple occurrence of some character in a String
item.description: The following is a Java method/function which avoids multiple occurrence (in a row) of some character in an input String. The parameters to the method (i.e., inputs) to the method/function include: input - The parent String under consideration character - The character of which multiple occurrence (in a row) should be avoided. public static String avoidMultipleOccurrence(String input, char character) { if (input == null) { return null; } if (input.
